input.sentences: the reporters showed up for the event .
people started gathering around after that .
the protesters went in to full swing upon seeing a crowd .
cops where there . it was crazy .

output.sentences: Several reporters covered an event for the local news station.
It started with people gathering to support the new bill.
The mood began to swing as protesters began to crowd the Capitol.
Things escalated and got so crazy that the police arrived.
The protesters stood their ground during such a somber moment.
